name: CimpleO
tagline: Web, Mobile and IoT solutions. Easy.
description:
We're CimpleO LLC, award-winning production studio who deliver on-time and under-budget. Guaranteed. Since 2012.
We're focused on meeting client expectations with top technical expertise that consistently delivers innovative and high-quality technology solutions. 
We build our business relationships based on mutual respect and trust, a deep commitment to the highest service quality, technical excellence, talented engineers and a culture of innovation. 
We serve enterprise clients, startups, entrepreneurs, artists and many others.Our team of creative technologists based in Omsk, Russia are dedicated to providing exceptional solutions and services for our clients around the world.
We achieved:
Clutch Top 10 Russian Web Development Companies 2017
Numerous Runet Rating Awards 2016-2019
Final of "Golden site 2017" Awards
Feedbacks from our valuable customers, who become our partners.
We develop custom software, complex web services, desktop applications, client-server systems, elegant web and mobile apps as well as IoT solutions that are made to scale.Fast, stable, and solid backbone for any application.
We would like to discuss the way we could bring you best experience and reduce future maintenance bills.
You've found the team that is able to solve your problems, even the most difficult ones.
You'll be amazed.
